definition: of or relating to the philosophical system developed by Lao-tzu and Chuang-tzu advocating a simple honest life
details:
adjective
- of or relating to the philosophical system developed by Lao-tzu and Chuang-tzu advocating a simple honest life
- of or relating to the popular Chinese religious system based on the teachings of Lao-tzu but including a pantheon of gods along with divination and magic
= example: of or relating to the popular Chinese religious system based on the teachings of Lao-tzu but including a pantheon of gods along with divination and magic
